overview: International Finance graduate from Istanbul Bilgi University and also studied Business Administration-Economy in Technical University of Ostrava. During his education, Caglayan concentrated on finance, e-commerce and management of SME’s. Started his professional volleyball career, in young ages. Trained the youth teams for Turkish National Olympics Committee and several sport clubs. Afterwards Caglayan continued his career in Corporate Banking department in HSBC Bank. Later worked as executive in a company which operates stock investments, real estate investments and construction. Berk Caglayan is a director in a world-wide non-profit organization and speaks Spanish, German, Turkish and English.
